text: Romania participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Romanian squad consisted of 30 athletes competing in 12 sports: aquatics (swimming), athletics, boxing, canoeing, fencing, gymnastics, judo, rowing, shooting, table tennis, tennis and weightlifting.http://www.cosr.ro/stire.html?id_stiri=573 ==Medalists== Gymnast Andrei Muntean performing on the horizontal bar during the artistic gymnastics competition on 16 August 2010 at Bishan Sports Hall, Singapore {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
